messages.message: Hi All. Heymian and I moved Jenkins to SAML 2.0 SSO via okta tonight. Everyone in eng currently has the app assigned to them and can login through okta. You will no longer be able to use the credentials stored in 1Pass. Please let me know if you run into any issues. Thanks
fyi - If anyone gets trapped in a re-direct loop, try logging completely out of Okta, and then log back in
